# accelerationStructureIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the acceleration structure to use for the instance.

## Declaration

```swift
var accelerationStructureIndex: UInt32
```

## Discussion

This index refers to a bottom-level instance in the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLInstanceAccelerationStructureDescriptor/instancedAccelerationStructures] of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLInstanceAccelerationStructureDescriptor] that you use to create the new instance acceleration structure.

## Related Documentation

- **instancedAccelerationStructures**: The bottom-level acceleration structures that instances use in the instance acceleration structure .
